articles.title: 21 Essential Pieces For Your School Capsule Wardrobe
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: The article features an introduction to a variety of new clothing items tailored for college students.  Items range from basic tees and jeans to more formal wear like LBDs and blazers, catering to diverse campus occasions.

articles.title: 31 Viral TikTok Products That Live Up To The Hype
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Neutrogena introduced Hydro Boost body gel cream. Owala launched FreeSip stainless-steel water bottle. Dr Teal's released Sleep Spray with melatonin. E.l.f. launched a color corrector. Essence introduced Lash Princess mascara. Bio-Collagen launched Real Deep mask. Elizavecca released hair protein treatment. Dash introduced Rapid egg cooker. Carhartt launched a Beanie and Elizabeth Mott introduced Thank Me Later eyeshadow primer.

articles.title: Five-star-rated hairdryer shoppers compare to Dyson is slashed in price: ‘Just buy it'
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Laifen offers a more affordable hairdryer alternative to Dyson's Supersonic, available on Amazon Australia. The Laifen hairdryer features a high-speed motor, negative ion technology, temperature control, and attachments for styling, with positive customer reviews.

articles.title: ‘I went to Essex city's new international market and found new favourite drink'
articles.summary: R&R Mini Mart, an independent international supermarket, has opened in The Meadows Shopping Centre in Chelmsford. The store offers a diverse range of international products, including drinks, fruits, vegetables, rice, pasta, seeds, nuts, and seasonings, catering to various tastes at affordable prices.

articles.title: Can you trust AI for skincare routine? Bhakti Modi, Shantanu Deshpande and Diipa Khosla reveal
articles.author: Sneha Biswas
articles.summary: Nikhil Kamath discussed with Bhakti Modi from Tira, Shantanu Deshpande from Bombay Shaving Company, and Diipa Khosla from Inde Wild about using AI to personalize skincare product recommendations. They explored the idea of analyzing user photos and location data to suggest the right skincare products, potentially leading to a new service offering tailored to individual needs.

articles.title: CONSYNC Digital: A decade of digital made better
articles.summary: CONSYNC Digital celebrated its 10th anniversary by launching a rebrand and the 'Digital Made Better' campaign. They also formed two specialized studios, QODE for website design and development, and NUNO for visual identities, to offer integrated solutions.

articles.title: 36 Items Sitting In Your Cart That You Should Buy Now
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream to improve skin texture and elasticity. Downy launched fabric sprays to remove wrinkles without ironing. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Clinique promotes Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey.

articles.title: Marketing 5D strategies meet the power of digital scent
articles.summary: Olorama Technology, a pioneer in digital scent technology, offers patented systems that deliver over 200 scents to enhance multi-sensory brand experiences. L'Oréal's Lancôme has already used Olorama's technology at events to improve attendee experience and brand presence, demonstrating the use of 5D marketing with sensory elements for immersive experiences.

articles.title: La Jolla resident's online marketplace offers direct connection to local farmers
articles.author: Ashley Mackin Solomon
articles.summary: Navore Market, a new digital platform akin to a virtual farmers market, has launched to connect users with local farmers and producers. Founded by Caroline Driehaus, the platform allows customers to order local produce and pantry items online with delivery or pickup options. Navore Market aims to make local foods more accessible and convenient for customers.

articles.title: Dermatologist names and shames the popular products he NEVER recommends: 'They ruin your skin'
articles.author: EMMA GRITT
articles.summary: Dr. Sina Ghadiri advises against using St. Ives Apricot Scrub due to its abrasive walnut shell particles causing microtears. He also warns against Clarisonic cleansing brushes due to over-exfoliation and irritation, advising gentle cleansing with fingertips instead. Additionally, Biore Blackhead strips are discouraged for damaging the skin barrier, with salicylic acid products recommended as a better alternative, and makeup removal wipes are criticized for harshness and residue, suggesting gentle oil or micellar water cleanses.

articles.title: 18 Eleventh-Hour Holiday Deals on Games, Headphones, and More
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: An advent calendar featuring Baby Yoda socks is now available.

articles.title: 12 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From Starter Heels to Precise Pens
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Dazzle Dry launched a new polish. Lululemon introduced a small wristlet. Rebecca Minkoff launched a liquid illuminator. Outdoor Voices updated its stretchy exercise dresses, supersoft CloudKnit fabric, and lined gym shorts.

articles.title: Shoppers love 'nifty' self-emptying robot vacuum with 'easy set-up' now £50 off
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: The Dreame D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum is available on Amazon for £149, reduced from £199. It features 6,000 Pa suction, a 570 ml dust box, and smartphone app control for scheduling and mapping. Dyson has also reduced the price of the V8 Advanced cordless vacuum to £299.99.

articles.title: Internet users rush for NordVPN deal as it cuts 73% off subscriptions
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: NordVPN is offering a 73% discount on its VPN subscriptions, making the basic service available for £2.39 a month for two years.  The offer includes three extra months of service and covers up to 10 devices.

articles.title: *Thousands* Of Reviewers Love These 34 Home Products
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Several new household products are introduced: Swedish dishcloths for absorbency and waste reduction; an indoor insect trap to manage produce bugs; and cushion supports to revitalize seating. Also highlighted are a Bissell Little Green machine for stain removal, an outlet shelf for phone charging, and a fabric defuzzer for furniture. Additional products mentioned are a shirt folder, sound dampeners, a TubShroom, duster sponge, sink extenders, dining chair slipcovers, pet-resistant screen, pillow-shaking alarm clock, dishwasher cleaning tablets, sunglasses organizer, rug grippers, battery organizer, ChomChom pet hair remover, bath toy storage bag, garage storage rack, toilet tank cleaner, shoe organizers, paint pen, wood polish, shower cleaner, shelf dividers, electrical outlet cover, standing weeder, bed bands, washing machine tablets, oven liners, The Pink Stuff, and a rechargeable electric lighter.

articles.title: These 4 Android launchers fill the gap Nova is leaving behind
articles.author: Keval Shukla
articles.summary: Following Nova Launcher's departure, Microsoft Launcher enables Android customization by tweaking home screen aspects and syncing with Microsoft accounts. Niagara Launcher offers a minimalist, list-based interface focused on reducing screen time. AIO Launcher presents a text-based, information-rich home screen, while Smart Launcher 6 provides extensive customization options and supports Nova Launcher backup imports.

articles.title: The "Rizzbot" keeps going viral interacting with humans on city streets. What is it?
articles.author: Anna Good
articles.summary: Unitree Robotics created 'Jake the Rizzbot,' a four-foot-tall AI-driven robot that is able to walk, jog, and dance. The robot uses a large language model to mimic internet slang and interact with people, costing approximately $16,000.

articles.title: The Nordstrom Fall Sale Is the Best Time to Refresh My Body Care Essentials
articles.author: Ariel Baker
articles.summary: Several beauty and body care products are highlighted, including Salt and Stone's body wash, Augustinus Bader body oil, La Mer body cream, and Byredo's Mojave Ghost lotion. The Ordinary's salicylic acid body serum and L'Occitane almond body spray are also mentioned as products available during the Nordstrom Fall Savings Event, providing an opportunity to explore the use of new body care.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE Hits Turkish Market with an Affordable Offer
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy Buds 3 FE in Turkey. The earbuds feature ANC, ambient sound mode, and long battery life. They are available for purchase at TRY 2,499 through Samsung's online store, authorized retailers, and major electronics chains.

articles.title: Intel and Nvidia could change consoles forever
articles.summary: Intel and Nvidia are in a strategic alliance that could lead to future Xbox and Nintendo Switch consoles using Intel CPUs and Nvidia GPUs. This partnership may give access to Nvidia's DLSS 4 technology, which promises better graphics. A new Nintendo Switch powered by Intel and Nvidia could deliver a more balanced and powerful gaming experience.

articles.title: Adrian Cheng sharpens focus on 'transformative industries' under new firm ALMAD Group
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Adrian Cheng launched ALMAD Group, a new business focused on 'transformative industries' like culture, healthcare, and digital assets, targeting markets in Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and mainland China. The group owns the 'K11 by AC' brand.

articles.title: Chef Eze: Making Potorio Burger a game changer
articles.author: Ayo Oyoze Baje
articles.summary: EZE GOURMET, led by CEO Onukagha Ezenwa Justice, has launched the Potorio Burger at Covenant University, aiming to revolutionize the burger market. The Potorio Burger focuses on rich flavors, creamy textures, and premium ingredients, designed to be a culinary experience. The company plans to expand nationally with branches in campuses, supermarkets, and at various events.

articles.title: How Prince St. Pizza Turned Neighborhood Culture Into National Scale
articles.author: Hannah Reed
articles.summary: Prince St. Pizza has invested in a new water source replication system. This technology recreates the mineral composition of New York City water, ensuring consistent taste in their pizza dough and sauce across all locations. This investment aims to replicate the authentic New York pizza experience in every city where Prince St. Pizza operates.

articles.title: I tried Soap & Glory's advent calendar with £92 worth of 'scentsational' products for £48
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
org: House of Glory Soap and Glory
articles.summary: Soap & Glory is launching the "House Of Glory! 24 Day Advent Calendar" for the festive season, containing 24 travel-sized and full-sized products, including body washes, body butters, face masks, and rollerball perfumes. The calendar, retailing for £48 with a combined value of £92, features a mix of familiar and new scents, including a limited-edition "Berry & Bright" festive scent.

articles.title: Review: Oppo Pad SE Matte Display Edition
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the Pad SE tablet with a matte display. The Oppo Pad SE is priced at NZ$500.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy S25 model rivals iPhone 17 with £23 deal and £370 freebie bundle
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new addition to its Galaxy S25 series, positioned as an attainable entry point into the Galaxy AI ecosystem. The phone features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED display, a 12MP ultra-wide camera, a 50MP wide camera, and Galaxy AI functions, with prices starting at £649.

articles.title: 34 Products With Next-Level Results
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream featuring aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to improve skin texture and elasticity. Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream enriched with Q10 to enhance skin firmness. Mielle introduced a Rosemary Mint strengthening oil containing biotin to fortify hair and hydrate dry scalps. Sol de Janerio launched Brazilian Bum Bum body cream to smooth and tighten skin.

articles.title: Supermarket launches new Signature range for Christmas with its fattest ever pigs in blankets
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched 'The Best Signature Collection,' a new premium range for Christmas, featuring over 50 new products. Highlights include the retailer's fattest ever pigs in blankets, a Sausage Roll Wreath, and a Belgian Chocolate and Praline Star. The new Limoncello Panettone is also available, infused with limoncello syrup and studded with candied citron peel.

articles.title: Pear distributors in Korla introduce smart facilities to improve product quality
articles.summary: Pear distributors in Korla City introduced an advanced digital intelligent sorting system to improve the quality and accuracy of sorting Korla fragrant pears. This system assesses pears in multiple dimensions to ensure high standards, optimizing weight, color, sugar content, and internal quality. The aim is to elevate the Korla fragrant pear brand and ensure high product quality for the international market.

articles.title: Aussie Cleaning Hack: "Magic" Spray Transforms Grime!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The cleaning industry is shifting towards specialized and sustainable solutions, exemplified by the popularity of 'The Pink Stuff,' a cleaning paste known for its effectiveness. Consumers are increasingly seeking targeted cleaners for specific surfaces and messes, driven by a desire for efficiency and better results.  Brands are also exploring eco-friendly alternatives like concentrated refills and innovative packaging materials to reduce environmental impact.

articles.title: Nothing Ear (Open) review: For those who value spatial awareness while listening to audio
articles.author: Sahil Bhalla
articles.summary: Nothing has launched its Ear (Open) earbuds in India for ₹17,999, with a special Flipkart Big Billion Day offer of ₹9,999. The Ear (Open) features a distinctive open design with 14.2mm dynamic drivers, an in-house Sound Seal System and an ergonomic ear hook design. The earbuds are targeted at athletes and users who prioritize situational awareness.

articles.title: Next-Gen Porsche 918 Render Shows A Stunning Vision Of Its Hypercar Successor
articles.summary: Ugur Sahin has unveiled the 960 GT RS, a digital concept car. Envisioned as a potential successor to Porsche's 918 Spyder, the design blends elements of the 918 and 911. The concept is positioned as a 'hyper-GT', targeting a broader audience by balancing high-speed capability with long-distance comfort.

articles.title: 25 Mundane But Extremely Useful Target Items
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new products and services, including fabric Band-Aids ($3.99), a jar-opening tool ($16.78), a faucet extender ($9.99), a Frida Baby pacifier medicine dispenser ($11.49), vacuum seal bags ($20), a produce keeper ($19.99), a Rubbermaid scrubber ($20.99), a ceramic double griddle ($72.99), a comfort mat ($30), Fix-A-Flat tire inflator ($7.39), reusable zippered bags ($22.99), ice cube trays with lids ($12.99), Downy Wrinkle Releaser fabric spray ($8.39), toenail clipper ($9.99), callus-removing gel kit ($9.99), cooktop cleaner ($5.49), Scotch-Brite Handy Brush ($2.79), Command mop and broom grippers ($14.99), a flying-insect trap ($14.99), closet shelf dividers ($26.99), felt furniture pads ($6.27), a collapsible whisk ($11), Shout dye-trapping sheets ($13.49), shower hooks ($12), and an outlet plug ($16.99).

articles.title: Zoom launches a cross application AI notetaker, AI avatars and more in its latest update
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Zoom launched new products at its Zoomtopia conference. The new offerings include an upgraded AI companion that works across meeting apps, the ability to add notes, AI-powered meeting scheduling, and AI avatars.

articles.title: Sleep Like Never Before: The Best Mattresses for Every Need!
articles.summary: A range of mattresses is available, offering features like dual-sided firmness, orthopedic memory foam, and natural latex construction. These mattresses come with warranties ranging from 7 to 10 years, emphasizing comfort, spinal alignment, and a cool sleeping experience.

articles.title: Shoppers race to buy robot vacuum cleaner slashed from £200 to £45
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering a 78% discount on the Smart Home Sweeping and Mopping Robot vacuum cleaner, reducing the price to £45. Eufy has discounted the Eufy L60 and G50 models, while Roborock offers the Q10 S5+ with a self-emptying docking station.

articles.title: Amazon Sale early deals on washing machines are live! Grab up to 55% off on top-load and front-load models
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Amazon is offering significant discounts on washing machines from various brands like LG (up to 30% off), Samsung (up to 40% off), Panasonic, Godrej (up to 50% off), and Bosch (up to 50% off) during its sale events. These offers include top-load and front-load models with features such as inverter technology, turbo drum, Eco Bubble, and various wash programs, promoting energy efficiency and effective cleaning.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE deal rivals iPhone 17 with huge £370 freebie giveaway
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new addition to its Galaxy smartphone series, with pre-orders available now. The S25 FE features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide and 50MP wide cameras, 256GB storage, and a 4,900 mAh battery, and is available in four colors. It also includes Galaxy AI functions and Google's Gemini Live.

articles.title: Motorola Moto Pad 60 Neo Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Moto Pad 60 Neo on September 12, 2025. This 5G-ready tablet features an 11-inch IPS LCD display, a Mediatek Dimensity 6300 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 128GB of internal storage. It is powered by a 7040 mAh battery with 20W wired charging and comes in Pantone: Bronze Green.

articles.title: Utah Mechanical Systems Announces Up to 5850 Back for HVAC Upgrades
articles.summary: Salesforce launched Einstein 1 Studio, a new product empowering developers and partners to build AI-powered applications. The studio offers tools for creating custom AI models and integrating them into Salesforce workflows.  This launch aims to democratize AI development within the Salesforce ecosystem.

articles.title: New World scion Adrian Cheng launches firm targeting digital space, emerging markets
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Adrian Cheng launched ALMAD Group, a new firm targeting digital assets and transformative industries like entertainment, healthcare, and cultural tourism. ALMAD Group plans to globalize Cheng's cultural brand "K11 by AC", with its Anime IP business expanding in mainland China and the Middle East.

articles.title: 23 Target Products For Your Skincare Rotation
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article showcases a wide array of skincare products, including the Tula face cleanser, Good Molecules hyaluronic acid serum and Yerba Mate eye gel, Honest Beauty hydrogel moisturizer, and Jergens cherry almond moisturizer.  These products range from lightweight gel creams and sport sunscreens to serums, moisturizers and cleansers, are targeted to provide benefits from hydration and sun protection to acne treatment and anti-aging effects.

articles.title: LG C5 vs LG B5 – here's which affordable LG OLED TV you should buy
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: LG offers two affordable OLED TVs. A comparison reveals which TV provides better value for the consumer.
